ChattyChatChat Server Implementation

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void add_client​(ClientListener client)  
    java.util.List<ClientListener> get_clients()  
    void remove_client​(ClientListener client)  
    void start()
    Listens on the server socket for client connections, and starts a separate ClientListener thread for each incoming connection.
    void stop()
    Closes serverSocket, if it is still open; then, it aborts all clients and waits for their threads to die.

      public java.util.List<ClientListener> get_clients()

    • start

      public void start() throws java.io.IOException
      Listens on the server socket for client connections, and starts a separate ClientListener thread for each incoming connection.
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - An exception is thrown by the ServerSocket.accept() function.

    • stop

      public void stop()
      Closes serverSocket, if it is still open; then, it aborts all clients and waits for their threads to die.
